description: Sex and Submission presents a bondage and rough sex feature starring Penny Pax and Mickey Mod! A professional hit man is assigned to eliminate a dangerous drug lord. Penny finds herself in the wrong place at the wrong time and now he must decide her fate. A sadistic love affair ensues as he trains Penny to be his assistant. title: The Assassin's Dilemma
